agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: State Affairs TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Thursday, February 28, 2019 PLACE: Senate Chamber CHAIR: Senator Joan Huffman To consider the following: SB 15 Creighton | et al. Relating to the regulation by a municipality or county of certain employment benefits and policies. SB 40 Zaffirini Relating to locations, terms, sessions, and procedures for conducting court proceedings. SB 71 Nelson | et al. Relating to the establishment of a statewide telehealth center for sexual assault forensic medical examination. SB 73 Nelson Relating to personal information that may be omitted from certain property records. SB 201 Huffman | et al. Relating to increasing the criminal penalties for certain offenses committed in a disaster area or an evacuated area. SB 341 Huffman Relating to the appointment of an attorney pro tem for certain criminal proceedings. SB 415 Huffman Relating to the entry of a plea by defendants charged with certain misdemeanors involving family violence. SB 416 Huffman Relating to legal counsel provided by the attorney general to a political subdivision subject to a declared state of disaster. SB 467 Zaffirini Relating to the procedures of the State Commission on Judicial Conduct. SB 489 Zaffirini Relating to personal information that may be omitted from certain property records and political reports and to other court security measures. Public testimony will be limited to 2 minutes. If submitting written testimony, please provide 20 copies to the committee clerk with your name on each.
